title: Mr. tab: the boy and the apps
description: Meet Mr.tab - the little boy's new best friend. This unique kids story has a focus on screen time, game / app addiction and lack of social interaction faced by millions of children today. New technology has taken away family time and has diverted kids from healthy activities. This book tries to address this issue in a easy to understand story with an endearing blue car who questions the boy about his tab . It has very colorful pictures and simple text for children to understand.The little blue car also advises the boy about scree time. "Sharing and caring is part of being a family. Mr. Tab cant love you the way mom and dad can. Talking to your parents often is good."
author: Zach Abraham
